name: Punkie And The Zombies
description:
In the game Punkie And The Zombies, we follow a story that takes place in the countryside of Ceará, Northeast region of Brazil, in which a punk and adventurous girl, affectionately called by her friends Punkie, trying to investigate strange phenomena in the outskirts and thickets of her city, ends up being infected by a Jurassic parasite, and is tormented by dinosaurs, sauride demons, who personify the girl's traumas and fears in a single creature: zombies.

 Now, Punkie is trapped in her own cave of ignorance, and must survive a supernatural dimension infested by reptilian entities, eliminating the undead enemies she encounters along the way and collecting the burning stones, rocks with supernatural properties capable of repelling evil and evil. save you from your hideous nightmare.
